A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: FYI\, I am hearing rumors that RT is throwing out votes that notate \"1/2 star\" on their reviews as RT deems those votes too extreme for proper calculation of the audience score.  Thus\, the 51% audience score figure is questionable.  If you look through the reviews for the past 10 days\, the likability rating should actually be at around 25-27%\, but since 1/2 star ratings are not being tallied\, the result is skewed.  \n\nP.S.  This movie was AWFUL!!!
